      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        Called when the user wants to close the window. If the window is in another application then the window is just made invisible, but if it is a stand alone application then a really Quit ? window is given to ask the user if he/she really wants to quit or not.
        Overrides:
        cleanUp in class TrianaWindow
